title: The Blue Stones + The Vampire Diaries Stars Ian Somerhalder and Paul Wesley | 1930s Old Timbrook Kentucky Bourbon
itunes:title: The Blue Stones + The Vampire Diaries Stars Ian Somerhalder and Paul Wesley | 1930s Old Timbrook Kentucky Bourbon
description:
Alternative rock band The Blue Stones joins Fred backstage at Bourbon & Beyond, but is quickly interrupted by The Vampire Diaries stars Ian Somerhalder and Paul Wesley. Ian had been on the show before and impressed Fred to the point he had a special award for him.

Tasting Line Up

  • Rare Perfection 15-Year
  • Smoke Wagon Rare & Limited: 2 Hot 4 Retail
  • 1930s Old Timbrook
